root: ^: It’s been a week since I’ve moved here for work and I have no idea what’s in town.
^: Oh, shoot… I forgot, I got that letter from my mom yesterday… Let's see…

Letter: ^: I hope you’ve been enjoying your first few days in town.
^: I sent you some cookies like when we used to bake them when you were little.
^: Also, I hear there's a fantastic cooking school in the area. You always mentioned how much you wanted to be a chef.
^:Maybe you could take a few classes after making some
^: Hope to hear from you soon.
CloseLetter: ^: I need to get out more...
^: Maybe I should check out the farmer's market in town. They'll probably have fresh ingredients there to start cooking.
